title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.30 - Use, storage or disposal of signal flares or dangerous articles restricted
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.30 - Use, storage or disposal of signal flares or dangerous articles restricted

State Regulations

No person shall use, keep, store, or discard any signal
flares or dangerous articles as defined by the I.C.C. regulations, at a truck
terminal except under such conditions and in places specifically designated by
the superintendent. This provision shall not apply to fuel in the fuel tanks of
vehicles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1225.30

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
